Summary: Flying lights/object which made no sound.

divs: sighting detailswhile camping in whiltshire, (uk) i filmed flying lights around 230 metres away from me. strangely there was no sound coming from those lights, but i was able to hear cow, who wore much further than flying lights. i would like to know if anyone have ever seen such think? more details about this event you can find in the description of youtube video http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=oqhio0lw-pk
